title: Avi - The easiest way to upload images, Compatible with numerous cloud storage.

home.title: Click or drag image to this area to upload
home.description: Supports right-pasting image link or image file uploads. <1>Please do not upload company or other privacy images</1>

setting.alert: Before using AVI, be sure to <1>read the instructions first</1>.

cloud.title: Cloud Setting
cloud.tips: The picture will be uploaded to the sm.ms cloud storage by default
cloud.grant: In order to open {{name}} storage, you need to allow {{name}} to authorize Avi
cloud.herald: This service will be opened soon.

failure.title: Copy failed
failure.description: Insufficient permissions, Must manually click on the picture to complete the copy url

copy.error: Copy url failed, Must manually click on the picture to complete the copy url

upload.fail: Upload failed, May be the reason for cloud storage configuration

auth.tips: Avi requires Google authorization to use custom cloud storage services
